Outdoor furniture

The first outdoor furniture collection by TA Design stands out for its cutting-edge materials, timeless design, and the entire company tradition, offering timeless comfort.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

The essence of nature, timeless design

Each piece is the result of meticulous material research, carefully selected to respect the environment without compromising elegance.
We use recycled and low-impact resources, creating furnishings that not only withstand time but also enhance the authentic beauty of outdoor spaces. It’s an invitation to experience nature with style, awareness, and harmony.
With TA Design, outdoor living becomes a natural extension of your home, where design and functionality unite to deliver an authentic wellness experience.
Transform your garden into an oasis of style and comfort: your slice of paradise awaits!
